skill.name: Battle
skill.description: Knowledge of tactics and strategy for planning, and fighting, large scale battles (anything with a dozen or more people a side). Combined with charisma, it is also used for leadership in battle.

skill.name: Bow
skill.description: Using either a shortbow or longbow.

skill.name: Great weapon
skill.description: Using a large weapon such as a great sword.

skill.name: Longshaft weapon
skill.description: Fighting with a spear, quarterstaff, pike, lance or similar long shafted weapon. If the weapon is being used one handed, then a shield may be used as well. The lance can be used one handed with a shield from horseback.

skill.name: Single Weapon
skill.description: Fighting with a single melee weapon and no shield.

skill.name: Two handed weapon
skill.description: Fighting with a two handed weapon such as a great sword.

skill.name: Two weapons
skill.description: Fighting with a weapon in each hand, such as with two swords for example.

skill.name: Weapon and shield
skill.description: Fighting with a weapon and shield.
